title: Nobody believes me when I say my teams are bad. But just look at this.

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Look at shen and Vayne.

Enemy team had a kill for every minute of the first fifteen minutes of the game...it was like clockwork. 

Everyone tells me to "carry" or to stop being negative when I blame my asshat teammates for throwing my matches. BUT JUST LOOK AT THEM!

I'm not being mean for the sake of being mean. I'm not being negative just because it's cathartic. I'm being deadly serious. My teammates are whats bringing me down.

replies.body:
Holy %%%% that build is terrible. Why do you get red jungle item on vi? Why did you get a FH and vamp scepter? Your team was tanky as all %%%% and you went 21-9-0 and built straight tank? 

Your team mates aren't bringing you down at all. Don't blame them because you don't know how to build or play properly.

"Team tanky as all f*ck"

Shen vaporized in an instant due to constant feeding.

Are you sure you know what you are talking about?

Considering I main Vi, and I have played over 500 games as her, I think I know what I'm talking about. Tank Vi got nerfed a while ago. I have a 57% win rate with Vi in plat, and a 76% win rate with her in my smurf that is around the same rank as your main.

But yeah, I just got lucky with teams, I guess.

It would be all fine and dandy if I wasn't inhibited by a human being artificially matching me with constant undesirables on a daily basis trying to "psyop" me (low bred criminal %%%%ING FILTHY SCHIZOPHRENIC AUTISTIC PEASENT STALKING AND HARRASSING ME ON A DAILY BASIS %%%% %%%%S RIOT FIX YOUR SECURITY/ENDORSEMENT OF SUCH). i'M GOING TO KILL YOU YOU STUPID %%%%ING AUTISTIC %%%%%%
